ModMetaData.name: Fallout: Nevada Soundtrack
ModMetaData.description: Follow the greatest conspiracy of Nevada, years before the Battle of Hoover Dam. Music done by Nobody's Nail Machine which blends perfectly to the Mark Morgan Original Soundtrack. Tracks: Ghost Town, High Wind, Improper Subdivision, Jammer, Line of Policy, New Vegas, Radiationless, Radioluminescence, Ride to Cheyenne, Root Information, Theme, Village, We Are Sorry, Wind of War.
ModMetaData.author: karbonpanzer
